import pytest
import json
import unittest
from pyspark.sql import SparkSession
from pyspark.sql.types import StructType, StructField, StringType, LongType

class TestFlattenedNestedJsonUnit(SparkSessionBaseClass):

    def test_flatten_df(self):
        """
        Tests the behavior of the flatten_df method
        Asserts that nested object is correctly flatten 
        """     

        # ARRANGE
        nested_object = {
            "person": {
                "name": "John",
                "age": 30,
                "favoritefood": "Pizza",
                "parent": [
                    {
                        "name": "Alice",
                        "age": 55,
                        "favoritefood": "Pasta",
                        "gender": "female",
                        "grandParent": [
                            {
                                "name": "Eve",
                                "age": 80,
                                "favoritefood": "Salad",
                                "gender": "female"
                            },
                            {
                                "name": "David",
                                "age": 85,
                                "favoritefood": "Soup",
                                "gender": "male"
                            }
                        ]
                    },
                    {
                        "name": "Bob",
                        "age": 58,
                        "favoritefood": "Steak",
                        "gender": "male",
                        "grandParent": [
                            {
                                "name": "Grace",
                                "age": 70,
                                "favoritefood": "Fish",
                                "gender": "female"
                            },
                            {
                                "name": "Jacob",
                                "age": 75,
                                "favoritefood": "Chicken",
                                "gender": "male"
                            }
                        ]
                    }
                ]
            }            
        }

        expected_schema = StructType([
            StructField('person_age', LongType(), True), 
            StructField('person_favoritefood', StringType(), True),
            StructField('person_name', StringType(), True), 
            StructField('person_parent_age', LongType(), True), 
            StructField('person_parent_favoritefood', StringType(), True), 
            StructField('person_parent_gender', StringType(), True), 
            StructField('person_parent_name', StringType(), True), 
            StructField('person_parent_grandParent_age', LongType(), True), 
            StructField('person_parent_grandParent_favoritefood', StringType(), True), 
            StructField('person_parent_grandParent_gender', StringType(), True), 
            StructField('person_parent_grandParent_name', StringType(), True)
        ])


        nested_json = json.dumps(nested_object)
        nested_df = self.spark_session.read.option("mergeSchema", "true").json(self.spark_session.sparkContext.parallelize([nested_json]))
        
        flatten_nested_json = FlattenNestedJson()

        # ACT
        nested_df = flatten_nested_json.flatten_df(nested_df)
        nested_df_count = nested_df.count()
        nested_df_schema = nested_df.schema
        
        # ASSERT
        assert nested_df.count() == 4, f"Expected flattened df count to be 4 but was {nested_df_count}."
        assert nested_df_schema != None, f"Expected schema to not be null."
        assert nested_df_schema == expected_schema, f"Expected schema: {expected_schema}.\nResulting schema: {nested_df_schema}."
